meanings.sent1: The storm clouds were darking the sky.
meanings.sent2: The sun was slowly darking the room as it set.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled ink on the paper, darking the page.
meanings.sent4: The shadows of the trees darking the path ahead.
meanings.sent5: The night was darking quickly, enveloping everything in its embrace.

meanings.sent1: The darking of the sky signaled the approaching storm.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the darking of the room as the sun went down.
meanings.sent3: The darking of the chocolate cake made it look even more delicious.
meanings.sent4: The darking of the mood in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The gradual darking of the forest as night fell was both eerie and beautiful.
